mapper.select: SELECT a.`id`, t.`bundle_name`, t.`asset_name`, t.`time`, t.`type`, a.`resource`, a.`scount` FROM bl_device_advert d LEFT JOIN bl_advert a ON d.`advert_id`=a.`id` LEFT JOIN bl_advert_type t ON a.`type`=t.`id` WHERE d.`device_id`=#{deviceId}
SELECT g.* FROM bl_device_game d LEFT JOIN bl_game g ON d.`game_id`=g.id WHERE d.`device_id`=#{deviceId} ORDER BY d.`weight`

SELECT n.`game_id` id, n.`name`, n.`property`, n.`type`, d.`res_url` url FROM bl_device_game_netres d LEFT JOIN bl_game_netres n ON d.`netres_id`=n.`id` WHERE d.`device_id`=#{deviceId} ORDER BY n.`game_id`
